dmca.title: ArticleInsider Claims 4 Infringements Inside Google Search
dmca.body:
Content Infringement Notice
Attn: DMCA complaints
On behalf of
ArticleInsider.com
5/10/2005
Contact Info:
Infosearch Media, Inc.
[private]
Marina Del Rey, CA 90292
Phone: [private]
Fax: [private]
Attn: [private] at [private]infosearchmedia.com

Incident#1

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the article "Kodak Cameras and Digital Technology" by Johnny Kitchens posted on the Article Insider web site at http://cameras.articleinsider.com/132653_kodak_cameras.html
Search Query: "The CX models are designed for easy point-and shoot accessibility right out of the box." Infringing Web Pages:	
http://www.digitalcamera.ru.com/article5.html
My email: [private]infosearchmedia.com Address: Infosearch Media, Inc. [private] Marina Del Rey, CA 90292 Phone: [private]
Email of infringing website: N/A
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Signature 
 Fax to: [private]


Incident#2
The copyrighted work at issue is the article "Nikon D70 Digital SLR Cameras Are a Breakthrough" by Johnny Kitchens posted on the Article Insider web site at http://cameras.articleinsider.com/132658_nikon_d70_digital_slr_cameras.html
Search Query: "Another benefit of the D70 is Nikon's expertise in lens manufacturing." Infringing Web Pages: http://www.digitalcamera.ru.com/article8.html
My email: [private]infosearchmedia.com Address: Infosearch Media, Inc. [private] Marina Del Rey, CA 90292 Phone: [private]
4. Email of infringing website: N/A
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Signature
Fax to: [private]


Incident#3
The copyrighted work at issue is the article "Advertising Jobs--A Growing Need" by Erwann Marshall posted on the Article Insider web site at http://jobsearch.articleinsider.com/200331_advertising_industry_jobs.html
Search Query: "The Internet has also created a whole new world of advertising." Infringing Web Pages: http://www.freelance-emplovment.info/jobs/Advertising-Jobs.shtml
My email: [private]infosearchmedia.com Address: Infosearch Media, Inc. [private] Marina Del Rey, CA 90292 Phone: [private]
Email of infringing website: [private]@freelance-employment.info
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Signature
Fax to: [private]


Incident#4

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the article "Examples of Grocery Jobs" by Erwann Marshall posted on the Article Insider web site at http://jobsearch.articleinsider.com/200356_grocery_jobs.html
Search Query: "There are many grocery jobs most of us are not even aware of" Infringing Web Pages: http://www.freelance-employment.info/jobs/Grocery-Jobs.shtml
My email: [private]infosearchmedia.com Address: Infosearch Media, Inc. [private] Marina Del Rey, CA 90292 Phone: [private]
